statements: SELECT * FROM early_childhood_education_resources WHERE resource_id = 1;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM early_childhood_education_resources WHERE resource_quantity > 10;
SELECT resource_description FROM early_childhood_education_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Book';
SELECT * FROM early_childhood_education_resources ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_quantity FROM early_childhood_education_resources ORDER BY resource_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM early_childhood_education_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Book' ORDER BY resource_name DESC
SELECT resource_type, resource_quantity FROM early_childhood_education_resources WHERE resource_quantity > 10 ORDER BY resource_type ASC, resource_quantity DESC
SELECT resource_name, resource_description FROM early_childhood_education_resources WHERE resource_quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY resource_name ASC
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, resource_quantity FROM early_childhood_education_resources WHERE resource_type LIKE '%Toy%' ORDER BY resource_quantity DESC, resource_name ASC

SELECT resource_name, LENGTH(resource_description) AS description_length FROM early_childhood_education_resources WHERE LENGTH(resource_description) > 100 ORDER BY description_length DESC, resource_name ASC
SELECT * FROM early_childhood_education_resources;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM early_childhood_education_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Book';
SELECT * FROM early_childhood_education_resources ORDER BY resource_type DESC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_description FROM early_childhood_education_resources WHERE resource_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT material_name, material_quantity FROM teacher_materials_available WHERE material_type = 'Workshop';
SELECT * FROM early_childhood_education_resources;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM early_childhood_education_resources WHERE resource_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM teacher_materials_available ORDER BY material_quantity DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_quantity FROM teacher_materials_available WHERE material_type = 'books' AND material_quantity > 5;
SELECT resource_id, resource_name FROM early_childhood_education_resources UNION SELECT material_id, material_name FROM teacher_materials_available;
SELECT * FROM teachers;
SELECT name, email FROM teachers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT resource_name, description FROM resources WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE in_stock = FALSE;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM materials ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM teachers;
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE availability = true;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM materials WHERE in_stock = true;
SELECT * FROM teachers WHERE id = 3;
SELECT name, resource_name, quantity FROM teachers JOIN resources ON teachers.id = resources.resource_id;
SELECT * FROM early_childhood_education_resources;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM early_childhood_education_resources WHERE resource_type = 'book';
SELECT teacher_id, resource_id FROM teacher_resource_relationship WHERE teacher_id = 1;
SELECT category_name FROM resource_categories WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM teacher_materials ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM early_childhood_education_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Book';
SELECT resource_name, resource_description FROM early_childhood_education_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Poster' ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT r.resource_name, m.material_type, m.quantity FROM early_childhood_education_resources r JOIN teacher_materials m ON r.resource_id = m.material_id WHERE m.quantity > 10;
SELECT c.category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_resources FROM resource_categories c JOIN early_childhood_education_resources r ON c.category_id = r.resource_id GROUP BY c.category_name;

SELECT r.resource_name, r.resource_description, t.teacher_id FROM early_childhood_education_resources r JOIN teacher_resource_relationship tr ON r.resource_id = tr.resource_id WHERE tr.teacher_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM early_childhood_education_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_type, material_price FROM early_childhood_education_materials;
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_email FROM teachers;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM early_childhood_education_materials WHERE material_type = 'Book';
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_email, teacher_phone FROM teachers WHERE teacher_phone LIKE '555%';
SELECT material_name, material_type, material_price FROM early_childhood_education_materials WHERE material_price > 50 ORDER BY material_price DESC
SELECT * FROM teacher_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Book' OR resource_type = 'Worksheet' AND resource_name LIKE '%Alphabet%'
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_email, teacher_phone FROM teachers ORDER BY teacher_name ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT material_name, material_type, material_description, teacher_name FROM early_childhood_education_materials JOIN material_reviews ON early_childhood_education_materials.material_id = material_reviews.material_id JOIN teachers ON material_reviews.teacher_id = teachers.teacher_id WHERE review_stars > 4
SELECT teacher_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM teacher_material_inventory GROUP BY teacher_id HAVING total_quantity > 20 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
